column8: Throughout history and across most cultures of the world, the snake , it's image and reputation, has played various roles from guardian to deceiver. Today, it is even featured as part of one of the modern world's most recognisable symbols - the rod of Asclepius - a single serpent entwined around a rod and used extensively by the medical profession.
column21: Snakes are celebrated here at weadmire.net, with this special snakey t shirt.
